job.title: Senior C++ Engineer
job.description: Firebolt is a major shake-up to the cloud data warehouse space. So far weâ€™ve built the fastest, most scalable, and most hardware efficient cloud data warehouse in the market, by far, and have helped some of the most data-forward companies in the world with their biggest data challenges. But this is just the beginning. We are a strong team of world-class data experts, led by ex-founders from Sisense and Looker. With $164M of recent funding by top VCs, we are poised to grow quickly and change how we work with data and what can be done with data. Firebolt is a Cloud Native system, consisting of numerous components provisioning, orchestrating and exposing the unprecedented capabilities of our Analytical Database (Data Warehouse).  You will be working on the database itself - the Core Engine, which is written in modern C++, judiciously embracing the features of C++14/17/20 targeting the Linux platform.
